New Records: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 14 runs in 3 overs
Key Match Events: Rishabh Pant reverse-paddle-scoops one over the slips for six to win it
Suryakumar Yadav tries to get it done in one shot but doesn't get hold of it
Rohit Sharma retired hurt on 52 with a shoulder injury
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma said at the toss, we're unsure of what to expect from the pitch
India's fast bowlers dominate on two-paced pitch
Ireland captain Paul Stirling said A tough one. The toss played a really important part in overcast conditions and then the pitch offered all sorts.
Post-Match Reflections: Ireland captain Paul Stirling said We weren't quite up to that challenge and India bowled really well to put us under pressure
India captain Rohit Sharma said When there's enough in the pitch, you've got to stick to your basics
Jasprit Bumrah said In this format you have to be proactive, you can't always pre-empt things, these are the conditions and you have to adapt as quickly as possible
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ireland would have settled for a good display in defeat but that poor batting display will do little for their confidence going into the rest of the tournament
India's fast bowlers dominate on two-paced pitch
India open T20 World Cup campaign with convincing win over Ireland
